English.UI.tooltip_order_groups_desc: Orders are performed in groups. Orders within the same group are executed simultaneously, while each group is executed one after the other sequentially.
English.UI.craft_view_desc: Here you can see the properties of each crafting step as skills get executed. Enabling lock-step makes Lisbeth pause before executing each skill, giving you time to see if things are going as you had hoped for an expensive craft.
English.UI.order_status_view_desc: Here you can see the progress of your orders once Lisbeth is running.
English.UI.use_bonus_masterpiece_desc: When calculating how many turn in items are needed for scripts, Lisbeth will use the amount of scripts you get when the item collectability is high enough for the first bonus reward.
English.UI.use_high_bonus_masterpiece_desc: When calculating how many turn in items are needed for scripts, Lisbeth will use the amount of scripts you get when the item collectability is high enough for the second bonus reward.
English.UI.masterpieces_desc: To obtain red and yellow scripts you need to turn in collectable items to a special NPC. However, the items you can turn in are different each day. Here you can specify four options for Lisbeth to use in case it needs to acquire scripts for your orders. It will calculate how many of them it needs, create them, and turn them in automatically. Make sure to keep the list updated!
English.UI.use_chocobo_desc: Summon the chocobo companion in combat
English.UI.enable_chocobo_stance_dance_desc: Switch companion stance between healer and attacker depending on your health.
English.UI.disable_armory_desc: Lisbeth won't check the armory anymore for anything. Make sure new items go to your inventory if you check this.
English.UI.use_cordials_desc: Allow the usage of cordials while gathering.
English.UI.use_hi_cordials_desc: Allow the usage of hi-cordials while gathering.
English.UI.use_watered_cordials_desc: Allow the usage of watered cordials while gathering.
English.UI.get_treasure_maps_desc: Loots treasure maps if they appear on a node and you have none of that type on your inventory.
English.UI.retainers_no_items: No items found. Make sure your retainer's inventory is open.
English.UI.name: Name
English.UI.ui_product_key_success: Your product key is valid. Thank you!
English.UI.skip_crafting_final_item_desc: Lisbeth will not craft the final items in your orders, and only get the materials for them instead.
English.UI.debug_mode_desc: Spams your log with debug messages. Useful for when things go wrong.
English.UI.ignore_stat_requirements_desc: Some recipes and nodes have minimum stat requirements. This makes Lisbeth ignore these requirements when making orders.
English.UI.ignore_level_requirements_desc: Ignore any level requirements that recipes or nodes might have.
English.UI.go_home_when_done_desc: Go to your assigned home location when all orders are finished.
English.UI.disable_mount_desc: Prevent mounting up when moving over long distances.
English.UI.disable_teleports_desc: Disables the usage of aetheryte teleports. Some nodes may be unreachable without teleports.
English.UI.disable_resume_orders_desc: If the bot closes unexpectedly or you stop it, the next time you start the bot it'll ask if you wish to resume the previous orders.
English.UI.flying_unlocks_desc: Check the places where your character can fly. This will be taken into consideration when traveling and checking item source availability.
English.UI.book_unlocks_desc: Check the crafting books that your character has unlocked. This will be taken into consideration when checking item source availability.
English.UI.reputation_unlocks_desc: Check the tribe reputation ranks that your character has unlocked. This will be taken into consideration when checking item source availability.
English.UI.quest_unlocks_desc: Check the quests that your character has completed. This will be used to calculate correctly several of your character's abilities, including unlockable crafting skills and GP regeneration rate.
English.UI.schedule_view_desc: Here you can see the schedule of timed nodes once Lisbeth is running. The slots represent opportunities to gather the nodes, and are calculated based on GP regeneration, cordial usage, and macro costs.
English.UI.error_no_active_masterpieces: No active masterpiece options that can be exchanged for [1]. Add some options on the Masterpieces settings.
English.UI.error_inactive_duty: The masterpiece duty for [1] is inactive right now. You can activate it on the Masterpieces settings.
English.UI.error_missing_gearset: You need to have a gearset for [1].
English.UI.error_low_level: Your [1] needs to be at least level [2].
English.UI.error_requires_flying: You need to unlock flying in [1].
English.UI.error_missing_aetheryte: You need to unlock the aetheryte [1].
English.UI.error_low_stat: Your [1] needs to have at least [2] [3].
English.UI.error_missing_reputation: You need a rank of [1] in [2] to purchase this item.
English.UI.error_missing_book: You need to learn the book [1].
English.UI.error_missing_quest: You need to have the quest [1] completed.
English.Log.error_schedule: There are timed orders with no usable source.
English.Log.error_no_valid_order: No orders where valid for iteration.
English.Log.error_still_crafting: Craft should be finished but memory reads we are still crafting.
English.Log.missing_orders: We can't start since there are [1] missing items. Please look at the Expand window for more info.
English.Log.started_without_orders: Lisbeth was started without providing any orders.
English.Log.error_no_skill_data: Could not find the skill data for [1].
English.Log.error_not_crafting: Character is not currently crafting while attempting to execute [1].
English.Log.error_action_missing: Action manager reports character doesn't have [1].
English.Log.error_no_skill_id: No skill ID found for [1] as [2].
English.Log.error_set_recipe: SetRecipe returned true but the current recipe ID does not match the one asked for: [1]
English.Log.error_data_manager_teleport: Data manager cache missing for aetheryte [1].
English.Log.error_teleport_combat: The player is in combat and cannot teleport.
English.Log.error_cannot_teleport: The player cannot teleport for some reason.
English.Log.error_slot_not_usable: The consumable bag slot is not usable.
English.Log.error_no_consumable: Could not find [1] in your inventory to use.
English.Log.craft_no_strategy: Could not find a viable crafting strategy.
English.Log.error_macro_not_usable: Could not use macro [1] for crafting [2].
